KadoDialogue: ^KADO: Careful now! The ground is quite slippery, if you keep moving that fast you may just fall face-first!
^CIELLE: Oh! Thank you for the tip... I was wondering why it was so wet!
^KADO: That’s quite alright. Us Awafe love the water so we’re not bothered by it!
^KADO: Are you two heading to the temple to pay your respects to the Great Spirit of the Cove?
^COSMO: The who the what now? Awafe? Great Cove Spirit? Respects?
^KADO: Oh my, will this be your first time visiting our temple?
TheRest: ^KADO: Ah! Us Awafe are a water tribe consisting of Navemar that look like myself, and Marquina!
^KADO: A great spirit resides in this cove and every day that we are here, we offer our respects to them.
^COSMO: Wow a water spirit lives here? Cielle, maybe the spirit can bless you with a shower...
^KADO: Well I won’t hold you up any longer! Head on over towards the temple!
